articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Soaring COVID-19 infections rattle Europe, fuel dread about holidays - 9News
articles.description: Soaring infections have rattled Europe, prompting new restrictions and fuelling a familiar dread about entering a new phase of the pandemic just in time for the holidays.

articles.author: Varun HK
articles.title: Orbiter discovers hidden water in Mars's Grand Canyon - Deccan Herald
articles.description: The ExoMars Trace Gas Orbiter, operated by the European Space Agency and Russian space agency Roscosmos, has detected "significant amounts of water" in Mars's Grand Canyon, Valles Marineris. The water, which is hidden beneath Mars’s surface, was found by the …
articles.content:
